article_text:
Denver, CO

A Delta airplane was severely damaged when it crossed a hailstorm on a flight between Boston and Salt Lake City on Friday night.

The windows of the cockpit were broken and the fuselage of the A320 was partly torn.

The DL1889 flight had to be diverted to emergency Denver airport, where it landed without incident.
